system.description:
Many are the secrets nature hides, and much knowledge is there for the taking for those with the patients or aptitude to learn it.  Whether scholars who choose to abandon dusty library, lecture halls, and laboratories for the much more verdant classroom of nature, or druids who dedicate themselves to the pursuit of all the knowledge the world has to offer, wild hermits often know lost or hidden truths unknown to others, some jealously guarding these treasures, others freely sharing them. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence or Wisdom score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain an expertise die on nature and survival checks.  You may always choose to use either intelligence or wisdom for nature or checks, your choice.  You also gain an additional specialty in nature checks.
  • You gain your choice of additional @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.sygit0xifd4lbg3g]{Natural Demeanor} option. 
  • Finally, any time a scholar ability requires you to expend a hit die, you may spend a use of wild shape instead.
system.prerequisite: 3 Levels in Scholar, 3 Levels in Druid
